Groups.Title: Find Objects
Groups.Subtitle: Information about banks and customers
Groups.Description: Here we place functions to find banks by BIN and Name and find customer by PNR and Name

Items.Title: Find Bank
Items.Subtitle: by BIN or Name
Items.Description: Make request to Database to receive as result table with information about banks. In request we could send BIN (4 and 6 digits) or Name (English, Russian)

Items.Title: Find Customer
Items.Subtitle: by Name or Order Number
Items.Description: Make request to Database to receive as result table with information about customer. In request we could send Name of customer or Number of order

Items.Title: Find Passenger
Items.Subtitle: by PNR or E-Mail
Items.Description: Make request to Database to receive as result table with information about banks. In request we could send PNR or E-Mail

Groups.Title: Finance Reports
Groups.Subtitle: Information about finance turnover
Groups.Description: Here we place reports about our financial statement splinted by groups (banks, status, time period)

Items.Title: Top Banks
Items.Description: Turnover for selected period focused on bank services usage

Items.Title: Top GDS
Items.Description: Turnover for selected period focused on GDS usage

Items.Title: Top Clearing Center
Items.Description: Turnover for selected period focused on Clearing Center (GateLine, eGO) services usage

Items.Title: Top Airlines
Items.Description: Turnover for selected period focused on Airlines usage

Items.Title: By Months
Items.Description: Turnover for selected period focused on all parameters with status 'success

Items.Title: Failed
Items.Description: Turnover for selected period focused on all parameters with status 'failed

Items.Title: Refunded
Items.Description: Turnover for selected period focused on all parameters with status 'refund

Items.Title: General
Items.Description: Turnover for selected period focused on all parameters

Groups.Title: Convert Me
Groups.Subtitle: Conversation XML, CSV <-> XLSX
Groups.Description: Here we place instruments to make conversation between XML, LOG, CSV to EXCEL

Items.Title: Log <-> CSV
Items.Subtitle:
Convert log files in CSV format.
Separate symbol is ',
Items.Description: Convert log files to CSV format and back

Items.Title: Log <-> Excel
Items.Subtitle: Convert log files to Excel format
Items.Description: Convert log files to Excel format and back

Items.Title: XML -> Excel
Items.Subtitle: Convert XML files to Excel
Items.Description: Convert XML files to Excel format and back

Items.Title: Excel -> XML
Items.Subtitle: Convert Excel files to XML
Items.Description: Convert Excel files to XML

Groups.Title: Price Analyze
Groups.Subtitle:
Price compare with
agents and competitors
Groups.Description: Here we place application to check prices from our agents and competitors with us

Items.Title: Make Search
Items.Subtitle:
Make search of airline content
in different services
Items.Description: There are a form that duplicates search form in popular websites with airline content sales. Also there are some config data that accumulate information about parameters of search

Items.Title: Common Report
Items.Subtitle:
Report according market
price investigation
Items.Description: After completing research we consolidate it in report form

Items.Title: Price Trends
Items.Subtitle:
Investigate of price changes
during given period
Items.Description: Here we make report that show us how price changed during given period by airline and website

Items.Title: Our Search
Items.Subtitle:
Form that helps to investigate
our prices for Sales Department
Items.Description: In this option we make a form where we help Sales Department make report about our advantages in prices

Groups.Title: B2B Reports
Groups.Subtitle: System activities analyzing
Groups.Description: Here we place reports based on B2B reports loaded from IDEA system

Items.Title: Success
Items.Subtitle: All successful bookings
Items.Description: In this page we show all successful bookings in given period

Items.Title: Failed
Items.Subtitle: All failed bookings
Items.Description: In this page we show all failed bookings in given period

Items.Title: Refund
Items.Subtitle: All bookings on refund
Items.Description: In this page we show all refunded bookings in given period

Items.Title: Error Codes
Items.Subtitle:
Library of Error Codes
and their descriptions
Items.Description: In this page we show Error Codes that we have in our systems

Items.Title: Airline Master List
Items.Subtitle: List of available airlines
Items.Description: In this page we show all available airlines with history of changes

Items.Title: Duplicates
Items.Subtitle: List of duplicate bookings
Items.Description: In this option we check booking during given period on duplicates

Items.Title: Search TimeOut
Items.Subtitle:
All bookings that declined
under timeout reason
Items.Description: In this option we look all bookings with over-limited timeout

Items.Title: General Consolidated
Items.Subtitle: Full report with filters
Items.Description: Here we make consolidated report with filters

Groups.Title: Configuration
Groups.Subtitle: Application configuration
Groups.Description: Here we save main configurations for our applications and its functions

Items.Title: Refresh Database with Bank information
Items.Subtitle:
Send command to refresh data
about banks from trusted sources
Items.Description: Since information about banks changes periodically, we need manually refresh info there

Items.Title: Connection Settings
Items.Subtitle: Parameters that influenced on connection
Items.Description: Settings that influence on connection of application with open sources (delay, speed, resources, proxy, conn_string to database

Items.Title: Search Engine parameters
Items.Subtitle:
List of requirements for search
function in agents and competitors
websites
Items.Description: Here we set parameters for search module

Items.Title: Websites Parse Configurations
Items.Subtitle: Website Parse Configuration
Items.Description: Here we save tags and ID to recognize information from websites that we investigate

Items.Title: Schemes Control
Items.Subtitle: Schemes
Items.Description: Here we consolidate information about all schemes saved in applications to further manage it in functions realizations
